methods.name: related
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate an undirectional (i.e. --) graph Relationship, which may be filtered.

label.description: The relationship label (type) in the DB

ref_name.description: A reference name to be used later in the rest of the query

properties.description: A Properties object that represents the set of properties by which the relationship is filtered

methods.name: related_to
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a forward (i.e. -->) graph Relationship, which may be filtered.

label.description: The relationship label (type) in the DB

ref_name.description: A reference name to be used later in the rest of the query

properties.description: A Properties object that represents the set of properties by which the relationship is filtered

methods.name: related_from
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a backward (i.e. <--) graph Relationship, which may be filtered.

label.description: The relationship label (type) in the DB

ref_name.description: A reference name to be used later in the rest of the query

properties.description: A Properties object that represents the set of properties by which the relationship is filtered

methods.name: related_variable_len
methods.docstring_summary: Concatenate a uni-directional graph Relationship, with a variable length.

hops_len.description: The string representing the desired relationship length

direction.description: The relationship direction, can one of 'forward', 'backward' - otherwise unidirectional

label.description: The relationship label (type) in the DB

ref_name.description: A reference name to be used later in the rest of the query

properties.description: A Properties object that represents the set of properties by which the relationship is filtered
